dmca.title: Haircare DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Via Email (removals@google.com)
 
Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
 
Dear Sir/Madam:
 
I am outside legal counsel to Tre Milano, LLC ("Tre Milano").  Tre Milano holds exclusive worldwide distribution rights to the InStylerÂ® family of products, including the patented InStylerÂ® rotating hot iron.  These products are protected around the world under U.S. and international patent and trademark law, and works incidental thereto are protected by copyright law.
 
Specifically, the InStylerÂ® brand is a registered trademark in the United States (Reg. No. 3496525) and around the world.  Similarly, the InStylerÂ® rotating hot iron embodies proprietary technology protected by patent in the United States (U.S. Patent 7,631,646, issued 12/15/2009) and around the world.  Further, numerous works incidental thereto are protected by copyright in the United States and around the world (e.g., InStyler Box (revised), Registered in the U.S. Copyright Office 7/14/2009 under Reg. No. VAu000995006; InStyler Website, Registered in the U.S. Copyright Office 11/14/2008 under Reg. No. TXu001599536.).
 
Pursuant to U.S. law, including Section 512 of the U.S. Copyright Act (17 U.S.C. Â§ 512), this constitutes a formal request that you IMMEDIATELY remove the material at the following links on the Google website:

Search Term: 

"  Instyler site:buy-instyler.com  "

Infringing Web Pages:



http://buy-instyler.com/
http://buy-instyler.com/ferquently-asked-questions
http://buy-instyler.com/instyler-videos
http://www.buy-instyler.com/



For purposes of 17 U.S.C. Â§ 512, the above-referenced web pages blatantly infringe text and artwork contained on Tre Milanoâ€™s official website (www.getinstyler.com), registered in the U.S. Copyright Office 11/14/2008 under Reg. No. TXu001599536, including Tre Milanoâ€™s exclusive right to prepare derivative works.
 
The use of the InStylerÂ® material in this manner is not authorized by Tre Milano, and that the statements in this notification are accurate.  By my signature below, I declare under penalty of perjury that: (1) I am authorized to act on behalf of Tre Milano, (2) Tre Milano holds the exclusive rights in and to the InStylerÂ® trademark, (3) Tre Milano holds the exclusive patent rights in and to the InStylerÂ® rotating hot iron technology, (4) Tre Milano holds the exclusive rights set forth in 17 U.S.C. Â§ 106, in and to InStylerÂ® packaging, manuals, advertising and web site, and (5) these rights have been infringed in the above-referenced manner.
 
Additionally, and beyond any possible â€œsafe harborâ€ afforded by 17 U.S.C. Â§ 512, Tre Milano has a good faith belief that the above-referenced website(s) are engaged in the unlawful sale of COUNTERFEIT copies of its InStylerÂ® rotating hot iron, as well as products infringing its patent in the underlying technology (U.S. Patent 7,631,646, issued 12/15/2009).
 
By this letter, you have actual knowledge and awareness of facts and circumstances from which infringing activity is apparent.  To the extent that this unauthorized distribution is hosted on your equipment or from within your network, demand is made the immediate and permanent removal of the infringing material.
 
Please govern yourself accordingly.  In the event that you choose not to remove the infringing material expeditiously, Tre Milano reserves the right to pursue all appropriate legal action. 
 
This letter is a confidential communication regarding Tre Milanoâ€™s rights and is not for publication.  Nor is this letter intended as a complete statement of the facts or law as they pertain to this matter.  Nothing in this letter is meant to waive, nor may be construed as waiving, any rights held by Tre Milano, all of which are expressly reserved.

My contact information is as follows: [redacted], Compliance Coordinator; c/o Tre Milano, LLC; [redacted]; Culver City, CA 90230; Tel. [redacted]; [redacted]modernmedia2000.com.

You may also contact: [redacted] (Outside Legal Counsel to Tre Milano, LLC); Tantalo & Adler LLP; [redacted]; Los Angeles, CA 90067; Tel. [redacted]; email [redacted]@ta-llp.com.


Sincerely,
/s/
[redacted]
(Signature on File)
